content.webTitle: Edinburgh festival podcast: The Guardian Live at the Gilded Balloon - the Mueslical

fields.headline: The Guardian Live at the Gilded Balloon - the Mueslical
fields.bodyText: To start the show, Miles Jupp is joined on stage by comedians Richard Herring and Sarah Millican with further contributions from Felix Dexter. "Maybe it's because of the enormous penis that I have, but I find no need to prove my masculinity," says Dexter. Then Brian Logan introduces the hotly anticipated Edinburgh debut of The Guardian: the Mueslical! performed by Craig Hill, Stephen K Amos, Chris Green, Lucy Porter and Tim Minchin. You can read his account of it here. The podcast is recorded in front of a live studio audience every day at noon - if you're in Edinburgh for the festival, we'd love to see you there. Tickets are free, and can be reserved by calling the Gilded Balloon box office on 0131-668 1633. More details on the venue's website. Warning: the show contains strong language.
